overview: Renowned UK drum teacher Toni Canelli gives a 90 minute step by step lesson.  Covering: Hand Technique, Reading Rhythm, Foot Tecnique, Playing and Reading 4-4 Drum Beats, Adding Cymbals, An Exercise to Learn 144 New Beats, Drum Fills, ... and gets you playing to six songs, including: Pop, Ballad, Rock and Shuffle.
title: Play Drums Now!
